محتاجين
علما وقيل له اللّه تعالي التّوكّلي وتولّا لنا عبد الرّحمــن
على بيعها واللّه اللّه إذا هلّت لك الجارية الّذي
وعد بيانها سيّرها لنا سريع وأنت تعرف
شرط الحوصهالحوطة الحوضة وقد أوقفنا عبد النّصر علــى
الرّقعة الّتي سيّرتها ولم تذكر فيها الدّمار الدينار
ممّا متاعنا عنّا ø ولا الدّمار الدينار يباع متاع ام امّ أهمل أجهل أحمد وتوقّف
عبد النّصر عن دفع العلامة فاللّه اللّه سيّر
تعلمه يدفعهم لنا وأم رضوان تسلّم عليك لدي

muḥtāǧīna ***
ʿilm:an wa qīla la hu ăl lāhu taʿālà ăt tawakkuliyyu wa tawallā la nā ʿabdu ăr raḥmāni
ʿalà bayʿi hā wa ăl lāhu ăl lāhu ʾiḏā hallat la ka ăl ǧāriyaẗu ăllaḏī
wuʿida bayānu hā sayyir hā la nā sarīʿ wa ʾanta taʿrifu
šarṭa ăl ḥawṭaẗi ḥawḍaẗi wa qad ʾawqafnā ʿabda ăn naṣri ʿalà
ăr ruqʿaẗ ăllatī sayyarta hā wa lam taḏkur fī hā ăd damāra dīnāra
mimmā matāʿa ø nā ʿan ø nā ø wa lā ăd damāru dīnāra yubāʿu matāʿa ʾam ʾummi ʾuhmila ʾuǧhila ʾaḥmada wa tawaqqafa
ʿabdu ăn naṣri ʿan dafʿi ăl ʿalāmaẗi fa ăl lāhu ăl lāhu sayyir
tuʿlimu hu yadfaʿu hum la nā wa ʾummu riḍwāna tusallimu ʿalay ka laday ya

They are in need of [.......].
[Let it be known that] ʿAbd al-Raḥmān has been entrusted, on our behalf, [... to be] known. He was told - in God Almighty is [our] trust! - that ʿAbd al-Raḥmān has been entrusted, on our behalf,
with her (i.e. the slave girl in question) sale. O God, O God! If the slave girl, whose sale has been certified (wuʿida bayānuhā), has arrived at your place, with her sale. O God, O God! If the slave girl, whose sale has been certified, has arrived at your place,
dispatch her to us immediately! You [already] know dispatch her to us immediately! You know
the legal procedures of [her] guardianship (sharṭ al-ḥawṭa) already. ... the legal procedures of [her] guardianship. We have notified ʿAbd al-Naṣr about [......].
The letter you sent did not mention the damages
that would [cost] us. Nor [did it mention whether] the damaged [goods] will be sold or be left out.
ʿAbd al-Naṣr has stopped paying for the ʿalāma-trade mark. O God, O God! Send
[him a letter] and tell him to pay them (i.e., the fees) to us. Umm Riḍwān sends her regards to you [.....].
